definition: to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House

thigh/part of a whole/portion of a sum/(stock) share/strand of a thread/low-level administrative unit, translated as "section" or "department" etc, ranked below 科[ke1]/classifier for long winding things like ropes, rivers etc/classifier for smoke, smells etc: thread, puff, whiff/classifier for bands of people, gangs etc/classifier for sudden forceful actions

sentences.english: to formulate work plans for dispatching representatives of state stock ownership to the state holding and joint-stock corporations.
sentences.chinese: 拟订向国有控股和参股公司派出国有股权代表的方案。

sentences.english: The joint-stock project companies can draft relevant systems by referring to this system.
sentences.chinese: 各参股项目公司可参照本制度拟定相关制度。

sentences.english: Groundbreaker – Syndicator of participations of sponsored projects.
sentences.chinese: 赞助项目参股的联合者。

definition: to own a controlling number of shares in a company
to inject funds/to put money into (the market)
to fund/to put money into sth/to invest
to purchase (from various places)/to acquire (a company)
